headline: Raspberry Party Shots
description: A raspberry vodka gelatin shot that is wonderful for parties!
name: Raspberry Party Shots
recipeIngredient: 1 (6 ounce) package raspberry flavored Jell-O® mix

recipeInstructions.text: Stir the gelatin into the boiling water until dissolved. Pour in the ice water and vodka; mix well. Pour into shot glasses or devices specifically made for 'Party Shots.' Chill in the refrigerator for 1 to 2 hours, until set.

review.reviewBody:
I made these for the 4th of July. I thought they were a little strong but the rest of the family loved them. In fact as I write this I still have a few in the fridge waiting to be sucked down. I doubt they will last past today.

This recipe definitely has inspired me though. I see endless possibilities for jello shots over the course of the summer.
Good. I used whipped creme vodka which was really good with it.
I've always been a fan of Jello Shots. I make mine every Christmas/New Years without fail. Want to make this even better? Try this with Whipped Vodka. It's freaking IN-SANE.
Have to admit these are tasty little suckers :)
Really good Shots. I made a lot of these for a party and it was a big hit!
Used whipped cream flavored vodka... Yum'
Made them in a square pan and cut into squares. I used black cherry jello and vanilla vodka. I would probably use a different flavor next time.

I've been making Jell-o shots for years and am always looking for new recipes. This one is very good. My other favorite is melon Jell-o with Midori. We always use condiment cups for the Jell-o shots that way you can put tops on them and they are transportable.
Spray the shot glasses with non-flavored Pam or nonstick spray so the shots just slide out!!

I've made these for years and love them. Sometimes I add a dash of canned Whipped Cream on top for fun. Try other flavors. Using orange flavored gelatin with vanilla vodka makes them taste like Dreamcicles!!
These were excellent at our poker party/New Years Eve party. The ladies especially enjoyed them. Thanks for sharing.

I used slightly different measurements but this is the same thing I made for my party this past weekend. They were a big hit! I've also made them with raspberry flavored rum and vanilla vodka and black cherry jello.
Jello shots are great for parties. These were some of the best jello shots I have ever made. My guests loved them. Hurray for Jello Shots!
Yummy! I made this as a last minute addition to a party and stuck them in the freezer to speed up the setting. Half way through I had to make more as they were so popular!
